ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I am aware of what thoughts are passing through my mind. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: I try to distract myself when I feel unpleasant emotions. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: When talking with other people, I am aware of their facial and body expressions. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: There are aspects of myself I dont want to think about. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: When I shower, I am aware of how the water is running over my body. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: I try to stay busy to keep thoughts or feelings from coming to mind. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: When I am startled, I notice what is going on inside my body. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: I wish I could control my emotions more easily. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: When I walk outside, I am aware of smells or how the air feels against my face. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: I tell myself that I shouldnt have certain thoughts. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: When someone asks how I am feeling, I can identify my emotions easily. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: There are things I try not to think about. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: I am aware of thoughts Im having when my mood changes. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: I tell myself that I shouldnt feel sad. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: I notice changes inside my body, like my heart beating faster or my muscles getting tense. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: If there is something I dont want to think about, Ill try many things to get it out of my mind. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: Whenever my emotions change, I am conscious of them immediately. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: I try to put my problems out of mind. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: When talking with other people, I am aware of the emotions I am experiencing. (Aw)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: When I have a bad memory, I try to distract myself to make it go away. (Ac)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Very Often

ElementDescription: Philadelphia Mindfulness Scale Awareness subscale total
Philadelphia Mindfulness Scale Acceptance subscale total
Philadelphia Mindfulness Scale Acceptance total
